Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 98 Filed 12/17/20 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
---------------------------------------------------------------X
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
- v -
GHISLAINE MAXWELL,
Defendant.
---------------------------------------------------------------X
TO: Clerk of Court
United States District Court
Southern District of New York
The undersigned attorney respectfully requests the Clerk to note his appearance in this case and to add him as a Filing User to whom Notices of Electronic Filing will be transmitted in this case.
Respectfully submitted,
AUDREY STRAUSS
Acting United States Attorney for the
Southern District of New York
by: /s/
Andrew A. Rohrbach
Assistant United States Attorney
(212) 637-2345
TO: Counsel of record (by ECF)

DOJ-OGR-00002159

additional_notes: The document is a Notice of Appearance filed in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. It is a formal request by an attorney to be added as a Filing User for electronic notifications in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
